mapper.select: SELECT m.id,content,name,postdate,r_no,stars FROM BGSREVIEW m JOIN members b ON m.id=b.id order by r_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into BGSREVIEW(r_no,content,postdate,id,stars) values(SEQ_bgsreview.nextval,#{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR},default,#{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{starCount, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: UPDATE BGSREVIEW SET content=#{content}, stars=#{starCount} WHERE r_no =#{r_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BGSREVIEW WHERE r_no =#{r_no, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
